tasks.task: Install lighting on the farm gate
subtasks: Assemble tools and materials needed for installation
Find a suitable mounting spot on the wooden sign
Mount the motion light onto the sign using screws
Connect the light to the power source for the gate
Test the new lighting system to ensure it works properly

tasks.task: Check on and care for the goats
subtasks: Prepare buckets of water for the goats
Walk to the area where the goats are kept
Monitor the goats' behavior and health
Attempt to catch a baby goat if needed
Provide comfort and care to any distressed animals

tasks.task: Maintain the driveway and surrounding areas
subtasks: Clear debris and garbage from the field
Plant and maintain grass and vegetation
Manage and expand the driveway by adding more rock
Drill holes for additional security lights or signs
Promote the availability of Sturney Ridge Farm shirts
Provide links to purchase the shirts on video description
Encourage viewers to support the farm through purchases
